If they are not subject to the law (exempt), they aren't eligible for overtime, but there are other rules that come with, like no docking pay. This means that no matter how much it annoys you, if you have an exempt employee who takes off two hours early to do anything--doctor's appointment, soccer tournament, just plain bored and wanted to go home--you cannot dock her pay.
